nbttag: {"id":"minecraft:painting","count":1,"components":{"minecraft:custom_name":"{\"text\":\"Postcard\",\"color\":\"gold\"}","minecraft:lore":["{\"text\":\"When placed on your island, it will\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"inspire your minions with the belief\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"that they too, might one day be given\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"the choice to leave if they work\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"hard enough.\",\"color\":\"gray\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"All minions on your island will work \",\"color\":\"green\"},{\"text\":\"5%\",\"color\":\"aqua\"}]}","{\"text\":\"faster.\",\"color\":\"green\"}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"\",\"extra\":[{\"text\":\"Your \",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true},{\"text\":\"Clay Minion I\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true,\"obfuscated\":true},{\"text\":\" sent you a\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\"}]}","{\"text\":\"stunning image featuring a towering\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"mountain on a very, very distant\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"island.\",\"color\":\"dark_gray\",\"italic\":true}","{\"text\":\"\"}","{\"text\":\"LEGENDARY\",\"color\":\"gold\",\"bold\":true}"],"minecraft:custom_data":{"post_card_minion_tier":1,"id":"POSTCARD","post_card_minion_type":"CLAY"},"minecraft:hide_additional_tooltip":{}}}
